alert.note: Alert for St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:56PM EDT until August 18 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN ST. JOHNS AND SOUTHEASTERN DUVAL COUNTIES... At 355 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Unf, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Unf, Ponte Vedra Beach, Neptune Beach, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, Baymeadows, Craig Field and San Pablo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
